channel.title: Player rights in deltascape?
channel.description: Ok I know how to change the player rights, and I do it while the server is offline and my player is offline. But then when I start it up again, log on and log off, it resets to a regular player....how do I make my player rights stay to what I set them to?

item.title: Player rights in deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Does character file save on log out? if it doesnt could be the problem, some how.

Read full topic

item.title: Player rights in deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM("You have been made Moderator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 1; savegame(true); c.disconnected = false; sM("You just made "+command.substring(4)+" Modarator."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); }

if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM("You have been made Moderator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 2; savegame(true); c.disconnected = false; sM("You just made "+command.substring(4)+" administrator."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Player rights in deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

it didn’t work…it is like something is making the character rights folder reset to make every character have the rights of a normal player.

item.title: Player rights in deltascape?
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

make the character log out, change the character file, save it, then make the player log back in.
